DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate clinical efficacy complete laparoscopic resection recurrent hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Analysis Complete Laparoscopic Resection Recurrent Hepatocellular Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator conduct prospective study 64 patient diagnosed recurrent HCC underwent surgical resection Sun Yat-sen University Cancer Center June 2014 November 2014 ; 31 patient enrolled laparoscopic group undergo complete laparoscopic resection HCC , 33 patient enrol control group underwent open surgical resection . The operation time , intraoperative blood loss , short distance tumor edge normal liver tissue , postoperative pain score , postoperative time patient could walk , postoperative time patient could pass gas , hospital stay , inpatient cost compare two group . The patient follow one year surgery , relapse-free survival compare two group .
